Posts.Content: Sep 10, 2013 02:14PM Jwright wrote: I posted on another thread about the dangers of pumps. The pump ordered for me was $5000-6000 model. After 2 yrs of a mystery illness, high BP (resting heart rate was 114-120), severe breathing problems, extreme fatigue, nausea, recurring cellulitis, sores on my chest, I discovered from a new PT that the pump was overloading my heart. Now I have a stack of Dr bills I can't pay and have been unable to work. The frustration of not knowing why I was sick was worse than enduring cancer treatments. I found this forum to tell my story and see if there is anyone else out there who has experienced this nightmare. After discontinuing pump use, my health has greatly improved.
Posts.Title: So tired after MLD, really upset about dx of LE Embemma Jwright
